entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with drizzle overnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 50 early this evening then light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7 with temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early in the evening. Periods of rain beginning in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low 7 with temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
